body:
When you play the card Growth Spasm it correctly lets you put a land onto the battlefield from your library, but according to the card it should arrive tapped. In fact it is arriving untapped. The Eldrazi Spawn is correctly being put onto the battle untapped so the only issue is with the land.

This is with a monocolour deck, using Magarena 1.51 on Windows XP.
author: [tobypwri...@googlemail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116326336243912562180/)
title: Growth Spasm puts land into play untapped

comments.body:
Thanks for reporting that - there's an omission in the code for putting the land into play tapped. Will submit a fix shortly.
